original_text: They worship idols. They do magic to hurt people. They become enemies and they fight one another. They are jealous of other people. They become very angry. They want to please themselves and to be important. They cause trouble. They make people belong to different groups.
korean_text: 우상 숭배와 주술과 원수 맺는 것과 분쟁과 시기와 분냄과 당 짓는 것과 분열함과 이단과

sentences.original_text: They do magic to hurt people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람들을 해치기 위해 마법을 합니다

sentences.original_text: They are jealous of other people

sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기 자신을 기쁘게 하고 싶어합니다

sentences.original_text: They make people belong to different groups
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람들이 다른 그룹에 속하게 만듭니다
